topic.title: Recovering Zeronet ID
topic.body: I forgot/lost my old zeroid.bit ID. Is there any way to recover it?

topic.title: 2 Zeronet Windows on Startup
topic.body: I think 2 versions of Zeronet are running on startup, any way I can disable this?

1_1DCTA8rrSFeKX7CzieU3CYwCjGZ2hYvamb.body:
> [ranxerox](#comment_1_1165u6pt5mQNFjyhMVwy6azB7bZuQGLA9b): nope, you fucked up. Next time save it on a flash drive of some sort.

I have the master seed and remember the username, could I use that?  Also, what steps do I do to back up my current account info?

Edit: I think I understand, on my computer I must have overwritten my old credentials without backing up it's user.json file.

1_1EWcSH8L4VBXvQVn4NB4s8HsJuJzNwATYD.body: If you could would you fight to take the holy Land back for the real Jews?
